Aug 28, 08:44 UTC

Thank you for your understanding.

Update : The resolution of this incident is still being worked on by our teams.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting/Webmail] - Webmail/Multiple filerz incident notification
entry.content:
Aug 26, 03:18 UTC
Resolved - We had an incident on Web Hosting and Webmail which has now been resolved.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 26/08/2025 02:25 UTC
End time : 26/08/2025 02:49 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Webmail and Web Hosting storage were unreachable.
Customers Impact : Customers experienced difficulties accessing their email accounts, both through webmail and desktop email clients. They were unable to send or receive emails during this time. However, please be assured that all emails received during this period were stored and are being delivered as the issue is fully resolved.
Additionally, customers' websites hosted in the GRA region were temporarily unavailable across all clusters.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment configuration malfunction.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
